name: emi.wn
description: The Worker Node (WN) is the computing node inside the Grid where the user s jobs are finally executed at a site, the job having been submitted to the Computing Element and the Batch System. On the WN the necessary middleware components such as the Logging and Bookkeeping, Replica manager, File and Storage clients need to be installed. Additional software components may be necessary according to the requirementsof the site supported VOs.
releaseNotes:
What's new:

    * This is the first release of the emi-wn. It contians only 64b clients



Deployment notes:

    * Installation using "yum install emi-wn", configuration using "path-to-yaim/yam -c -s /site-info.def -n WN"



Known Issues:

    * none
